data.sampled: The largest country by area is Russia, which covers 17 million square kilometers (6.9 million sq mi). The fourth-largest country is Indonesia, covering 8.7 million km2 (3.3 million mi2), and the fifth-largest is Japan, covering 7.1 million km2 (2.7 million mi2). The United Kingdom and France both cover 6.7 million km2 (2.7 million mi2) each, while Mexico covers 5.6 million km2 (2.2 million mi2).
